column5: Hey everyone here is our flier for the 2010 Belle River Lake St.Clair Muskie Classic.  The event will be July 2nd,3rd and 4th  I just wanted to take time and post this and invite fellow OFNCer's to come out and fish with us this year and also welcome back the others who come out each year. With the amount of musky caught and seen on the opener weekend the 2010 musky on LSC should be a busy one.
